sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { UserNav } from '../../component/Navbar/homeNav' import { useEffect } from 'react'; import OnBoarding from '../../SmartContracts/OnBoarding/OnBoarding'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Web3 from "web3" export default function MyMaterials() { const [materialsList,SetMaterialsList]=useState([]) const navigate = useNavigate(); const material=[ {value:"0" , label:"ABS"}, {value:"1",label:"PLA"}, {value:"2",label:"PETG"}] const colors=[ {value:"0", label:"NONE"}, {value:"1", label:"BLACK"}, {value:"2", label:"WHITE"}, {value:"3", label:"BROWN"}, {value:"4",label:"GRAY"}, {value:"5", label:"YELLOW"}, {value:"6", label:"ORANGE"}, {value:"7", label:"RED"}, {value:"8", label:"PINK"}, {value:"9", label:"PURPLE"}, {value:"10", label:"BLU"}, {value:"11", label:"GREEN"}] let result="prova" useEffect(()=>{ async function getMaterials(){ const onboarding = new OnBoarding(); const web3 = new Web3() var mats = await onboarding.getMaterials(); console.log(mats) const materia = [ "ABS", "PLA", "PETG" ] result = mats.map((value,key)=>{ return( {web3.utils.toUtf8(value.name)} {materia[value.mType]} {value.color} {value.quantityKG} {value.printTemperature} {value.bedTemperature} REMOVE ) }) console.log(result) SetMaterialsList(result) } getMaterials(); },[]) return (

My Materials

{materialsList}
name Type Color quantityKG Print Temp Bed Temp Remove Update
) }
